title: [Large-Scale] Understanding Inhibitory Conditioning Stimuli and Attentional-Associative Models Through Predictive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Learning Psychology and Conditioning Theories
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized course designed for pre-/in-service teachers to apply learning psychology theories in school environments.

learning_goals: They can predict and explain the core mechanisms of the attention-association model
They can analyze the impact of attentional change patterns under inhibitory conditioning on the learning process
They can interpret experimental results using predictive learning design and apply them to educational contexts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
